website_summaries.verdict: This innovative design uses the frame of a pop-up soccer goal as the start and end points of your drone race. And it's reflective for higher visibility at all times.
pros: Netless option for FPV racing available in yellow or red
Made with oxford fabric, high-tensile, solid fiberglass poles and PVC pegs
Light, fast and easy to set up
cons: Strings connecting the stakes to the gate snap easily, but this is more of a problem for soccer use where gates get more foot traffic

customer_reviews.title: Amazing racing gates
customer_reviews.text: Unlike PVC gates, These are light and super fast and easy to setup. No more sweating and dealing with so much frustration setting up a track Check out the video for the full review
customer_reviews.author: farnam

customer_reviews.title: Season 3
customer_reviews.text: I coach multiple teams of all different levels and have own all different brands of portable nets. If you need an slightly more affordable version of Pugg these are an excellent option. They have with stood two seasons, they are about to come out again. I have the 6' version....the height and depth are accurate measurements but the length is more like 5'. Only piece of advice is do not let your players try to open or fold for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kami MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for my niece, and couldn't be happier with the choice! Incredibly easy set-up (my 6 year old niece can set up, break down and store her goals on her own), they pack away to minimal space (easily stash in a closet, under a bed or in the trunk of a car), and include stakes to keep them from blowing away with the wind (or a powerful goal kick). Very pleased indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Edie Young

customer_reviews.title: Great product and quality
customer_reviews.text: We just got these in the mail yesterday and used them at last night's soccer practice. They seem to be good quality (especially holding up to the test of 5 little girls all pulling on them wanting to help set up!). They were the perfect size for practice and for something that we can use in the backyard also. They were easy to open, close, and get back into the bag. Although they've only been used once so far, we are definitely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: bauer308

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a portable goal that is both durable AND easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: As a soccer coach with a lot of equipment on hand, I was looking for a portable goal that is both durable AND easy to set up. After doing a lot of online research, I decided to buy this one from GreEco and am very pleased with my purchase. Only several weeks of play with the goals, so far, but it is everything that I was hoping for. Thanks for making these available on the market!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tozer

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. This is a great product. The attached pegs are sturdy and great to keep it steady. They are plastic and not as dangerous to small kids as the metal pins that some goals come with. Also the velco straps to keep the folded goals together are a good thought. If I work hard to come up with a negative, it is that the goal is a little tricky to fold up, and popping them open again is not something for kids to do as it snaps open with some force.
customer_reviews.author: AokiMA

customer_reviews.title: Clip broke first time but I like the design.
customer_reviews.text: The first time we opened them up, one of the clips that holds the black lace secured to the corner broke. Then, 3 weeks in to the season, we've now had the elastic attached to the stake snap. These are only used once a week for soccer practice. I like the design and have had no problems with one of the nets, but I would have like to have seen higher quality clips or maybe at least some option for replacement parts. Very easy to set up, take down and store. I like the design but can't warrant a 5 star unless I can get ahold of some sort of customer support for replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Still my favorite a year later
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe it's been almost a year since I picked up a pair of these gates. They immediately became my favorite, mainly because of how quickly you can set them up and tear them down. The other shocking revelation is they are all still functional and in one piece a year later - I cannot say the same about other 'fancier' (read: more expensive) racing gates, which I have used significantly less because of the time requirement to set the up and take them down. I don't usually write reviews, but I find myself putting this item on my Christmas list because I want more, and realizing they deserve the good press.
customer_reviews.author: IAN B.

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: My daughter chose these to spend her birthday gift card on. Love these goals- sturdy, easily stored, and easy to use. We had a huge regulation sized goal that she had at our last house and it really was too big. These goals make it easy to have a quick pick up game, or to use for drills, and since they don't have to be permanent, you can put them in the flattest part of the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Beck

customer_reviews.title: great for practices, poor construction
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these to run drills in my youth practices. The 6ft goals are perfectly sized and easy to transport. the quality is poor though. I have used them for 3 sessions. 2 of the goals have broken, which i repaired by putting a sleeve of metal pipe around the breaks and duct-taping them in place. Folding them takes a bit of experience, so I recommend only letting someone who knows how to fold them do so. Also, the zippers fell off both bags, which kind of sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Ishee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our 6 year old! We had some concerns over reports of poor quality. However, we found it easy to set up and sturdy. It comes with attached stakes for windy days and overall stability. It packs up easily so we can take it to the beach as well.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to setup and take down
customer_reviews.text: I really like these gates, easy to set up, easy to take down and put away. Very durable so far. I hit them with my drone at least 4 times yesterday and they didnt take any damage. I like them so much I will eventually purchase another set.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for the Soccer Enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 5 year-old grandson who is an avid soccer player. He has an older brother who is also a soccer player. They love this gift. It is set up in the back yard and it is used often. We have taken it to the beach and tailgating. Very convenient for transporting and assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Probably should have paid more attention to the measurements. ...
customer_reviews.text: Probably should have paid more attention to the measurements. The ones I ordered are quite small. Still work but are harder for the kids to make a goal. More for a golf ball than a soccer ball.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S

customer_reviews.title: Great compact size, less durable.
customer_reviews.text: Goals are the perfect size for my 3yo to play with her older sisters (almost 5 and 9). Fold up nice and compact. However, when she was practicing, she tripped over one of the goals and it broke-not the most durable. Otherwise, we're satisfied. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Tied at the Stake
customer_reviews.text: The net itself is wonderful and well made, my only issue is that I use the nets indoors and on fake grass as well as on a real grass field, and the ground stakes are not removeable from the net unless I cut them off. My child still likes to put everything in his mouth, so having the stakes hanging loose when I have no ground in which to stake them is somewhat concerning. It would be a 5 star rating if these were removeable.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Erlandson-Gedney

customer_reviews.title: We love the goals
customer_reviews.text: We love the goals. Very well made. However, the metal stakes for securing the goals bend too easily when pushing into hard ground. That was my reasoning for 4 stars versus 5.
customer_reviews.author: Megan in NC

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Our club ordered 3 sets of these. We just got done with our youth program and they worked out awesome. They seemed to be sturdy and held up to little bodies running in to them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They are useful for our purposes- 3 and 4 year olds soccer practice. We have the smallest ones and they are small but effective. Gets the kids aiming at a smaller target, so they have to have better ball control and aim. Easy to twist and fold.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Strings keep breaking!
customer_reviews.text: After playing one game in the backyard, the strings attached to stakes broke off and only the back stake held the goal to the ground which made it move around from side to side. I was a bit disappointed for the price we paid. The second time it was used the other goal's strings broke. I expected the goal to be a bit more sturdy. It's annoying having to retie the strings (and replacing them as they actually break into smaller pieces) after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong 1 year later!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my brother in law who uses them every week at soccer (men's soccer). Still in great shape one year later!
customer_reviews.author: hollyck

customer_reviews.title: Great inside and out
customer_reviews.text: The goals are awesome and the customer service was even better. We have had the goals for two months and have used them both inside and outside. They are easy to store or grab on the go because they fold up into a bag. We have an 800 square foot living room and use them inside in the winter or rainy days. The go outside when its nice out. The stakes keep them secure. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These goals have held up pretty well, much better than a prior brand
customer_reviews.text: My son plays soccer in my living and basement all the time . He drags around these pop-up goals to the backyard as well . These goals have held up pretty well, much better than a prior brand . It's small enough to carry to the park and was to fold away. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great practice goals
customer_reviews.text: I bought these goals for my 6 year old daughter. She really likes them. I set them up in the field across from my house and they work great. They are easy to set up and take down and I like that they come with a storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: J112575

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Sturdy construction. Perfect size. Bag for storage is very handy and saves space. I would purchase this again. High praise to the company also. Came quickly in the busy Christmas season and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: Portable pop ups
customer_reviews.text: Bought the medium size for my 5 year old granddaughter who loves to run, kick soccer balls and score goals. They appear well made, are very portable and easy to fold back into the carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The nets themselves are great, but they should improve the strength of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The bungee string that attaches the ground stakes to the net frame have all broken within 2 uses of the nets. The nets themselves are great, but they should improve the strength of the bungee cord to ensure longer lifetime use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already Broken
customer_reviews.text: Pretty small and you have to twist them and untwist to get them out of the storage bags. We already broke one the second time taking it out of the bag because the plastic snapped trying to untwist it. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Great....but a storm took them!
customer_reviews.text: These are WONDERUL soccer goals! Thanks for the great product! Just remember to put them away before it storms! My 4 year old LOVED them for the short time he had them! Must purchase a new set! Great product tho!
customer_reviews.author: Hay and Ana's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good nets for our 3 year old to learn on
customer_reviews.text: Good nets for our 3 year old to learn on. But netting is already becoming stretched out and worn from the ball being kicked against it. We have only used it a couple times.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted to practice her soccer skills at home. These goals are perfect size and stand up to all of her friends. I had read a lot of reviews and am very happy with my decision to get these. Solid
customer_reviews.author: Jill Ransom

customer_reviews.title: Good product. One of the straps broke for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. One of the straps broke for the peg so we had to fix it but it still works. That is why I gave only four stars instead of five. I got this for my son for his birthday after a season of soccer. He loves it and it is easy to set it up and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Sanja Djukelic Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These have been a great addition to our back yard as we practice soccer. Unfortunately one net has ripped and is useless. The stakes are nice to have as the nets are very lightweight and move from the slightest shots. Easy to set up and take down!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are really fun items to have. We have 8- and 11-year old soccer players. I carry these in the car with a soccer ball for impromptu fun and practice. I've folded them down numerous times and each time they pop back up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: shammy

customer_reviews.title: Great pop up goals
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry with you to beach/park. However the tent stakes are useless. Overall great product
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are bigger. My kids pull them out all the time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: halfpintct

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Comes with two goals. Pops open right out of the carry bag, and takes less than 30 sec to put back away. Love how i dont have to waste any time setting up and can just start using right away. Great for my kids teams games and practices.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are cool but the yellow fabric used is cheap and tears up way too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great practice gates!
customer_reviews.text: Gates are very easy to set up and take down. Steaks attached to gates prevent them from getting lost. Everything folds up easily and packs quickly into one convenient bag.
customer_reviews.author: B. Devero

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: After first use, the strap on one of the two goals broke and now the goals cannot keeps its shape. What a huge let down!
customer_reviews.author: MGR

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It did not have the spare pole, everything else was good.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set in red and a set in yellow as a birthday present. They're easy to set up and take down. These are exactly what I was looking for. However, they were not packaged properly and the carrying bag for the red set is badly ripped. The zipper was completely stuck and broke off the first time I pulled it. The yellow set was undamaged, so hopefully I can fit all four in the yellow bag. I would return the damaged set if I didn't need them right now.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Soccer goal
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my 7 year olds birthday and they are great for his size. The goals can easily fold up and can be staked to the ground when set up.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Vance

customer_reviews.title: You'll enjoy it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. He loves it. Decent product that doesn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: JefeHenk

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! Easy to store away and even easier to pop up and start playing. My little girl was so excited to recieve these.
customer_reviews.author: SamE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, it will be a Christmas gift for my grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: TSL

customer_reviews.title: Great Goals
customer_reviews.text: Very portable and sturdy. I use with my preK players and 1st graders. The goals do well in the grass when you can stake them down. You can use them on hard surfaces but the wind and ball will move them. They fold up well and are easy to use. No issues with tears or breakdown. We have owned for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: M G

customer_reviews.title: So easy to pack up and take to the park
customer_reviews.text: Got this as birthday present for my 3 year old granddaughter. Her mother was thrilled with it. So easy to pack up and take to the park, easy to keep in the car or garage or mudroom. Really a hit
customer_reviews.author: newnana2813

customer_reviews.title: Snapped in the first thirty minutes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these a few weeks ago and finally got the opportunity to try them out yesterday. They seemed great for about thirty minutes until a soft shot hit the edge and snapped one of the elastic tie-downs. I really wanted to like these but they're just okay.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett A.

customer_reviews.title: ok pop up tents
customer_reviews.text: pop up tents work great for my younger team. quality of the net seems good, but plastic steaks and 2 of them already broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Archi

customer_reviews.title: Great FPV Gates!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the fpv gate version and these are great, especially for the price. Wanted something smaller to help with practicing consistency. These will do just perfect. Gonna get another 2 sets soon. Won't use my pvc gates ever again. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Brandon C

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and pack back up!! Everything is attached so no chasing spikes down to hold in place. Parachute line material and can take a hard hit. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Keri Warren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed how easy it was to put up, and how easy to take down.. The kids loved it, 3 and 8 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for little kids. I use it for 4 year old kids to practice soccer. Easy to pop up and also put away when done.
customer_reviews.author: nanis

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the entire transaction
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the entire transaction. Great price for the product, super shipping time and grandson, turning 5, was thrilled with his birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Just make sure you get the size you want. The small size is indeed very small.
customer_reviews.author: HKY

customer_reviews.title: Great nets
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased the biggest goals for my 10 year old daughter as part of her birthday. She loves them. They are easy to set up and take down. She taught us how to fold them to fit in the carrying case. Carrying case is big for this size but still fits in the trunk nicely. I would definitely purchase again. Have used them for 2 months now and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great product.
customer_reviews.text: Goals are great. I hourly these to coach my daughters team. They've been very helpful. Easy to unpack, set up and then re-pack. I'd recommend to anyone needing some soccer goals.
customer_reviews.author: QTran

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than my toddler
customer_reviews.text: Awesome goals. We have had for 4 months now and they easily withstand my 3 year old who intentionally falls on top of them. :) Ground stakes hold up to strong winds. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Not very strong but works fine for small kids
customer_reviews.text: We shot the first 2 or 3 goals in and it was ok but after the 4th the rubber bands that hold on the the plastic picks ripped right off. Not very strong but works fine for small kids.
customer_reviews.author: E. Merino

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed! Bought this for my 5 and 9 year olds. After 2 months of using them I am pleased by the quality and durability. Love how easy they are to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: R. B.

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and conveniently portable!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Nicely made. Kids are having a great time with it! Love how it conveniently packs up and is very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan T. Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and compact
customer_reviews.text: These are light weight, which makes it easy to throw them in the car or wagon to take to the park. They also fold up (only took a few tries) compactly to store easily. Kids think they’re awesome and having the pair was important to me. They also come with little stakes to keep them in the ground which is nice on a windy day.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: The 2. 5 was flimsy and didn't really sit ...
customer_reviews.text: The 2.5 was flimsy and didn't really sit straight how we wanted it too. My goal was to not have to beat stakes into ground. If you want to then this might work for you
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Liked it
customer_reviews.text: Product is just as described. Easy to open; like the carrying case. Good price. Prompt delivery. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: LexieLovesMusic

customer_reviews.title: Really great product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Really great product and easy to use. I can bring it to the park whenever my son want to use it. This is a winner. ..:)
customer_reviews.author: D.kells

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: The goals are easy to put up and carry. They come in a bag. Our grand children love them. It is just the right size for them. They are 3 and 5. I would not recommend for older.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne J. Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Quality+Price=Excellemt!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and durability. I use them to play some 1v1 with my U15 son...a litttle big for that but they hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: John Stebbins

customer_reviews.title: Bungee's that hold the stakes broke on the very first ...
customer_reviews.text: Bungee's that hold the stakes broke on the very first night of use, the bags that hold the goals split at 3rd practice. Quality is lacking, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: CSGrizz

customer_reviews.title: Design not as easily set up as hoped
customer_reviews.text: Fiberglass side poles are tough to get into zipper pouch. Design not as easily set up as hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my soccer team of 5 year olds. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great gates for FPV racing!
customer_reviews.text: Great gates for FPV, work as expected and come with thicker stakes than the Quaddiction gates. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: aE

customer_reviews.title: Soccer net set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for inside or out for my grandson to play kicking balls around
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Robeson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the go fun or practice
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, durable, and great for accuracy skills or fun no-goalie games. Nice 3 point anchors for grass fields to anchor in place. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: SoSoCal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. I had these goals for less than a week and both support poles punctured the goals. They were easy to store and were a great size but I can no longer use them. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our use. We needed soccer goals for practices. Sturdy, well built.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Work great for our little soccer team practices
customer_reviews.text: Work great for our little soccer team practices. Easy to use. Tricky to fold but simple once you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Meylan

customer_reviews.title: Poor constructed
customer_reviews.text: This was very poorly constructed and didn’t even last 3 practices with my 10 yr and 12 years olds.. don’t waste your money..
customer_reviews.author: Gus O. Matamoros

customer_reviews.title: The stitching was very poor quality. The strap is necessary to hold the ...
customer_reviews.text: The stitching on the cross strap tore the first time I used these goals. The stitching was very poor quality. The strap is necessary to hold the flex tubes in the shape of the goal. I will have to restitch the strap to use the goal a 2nd time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Practice Goals
customer_reviews.text: The portable goals work great. Have used them with my grandson in our backyard and my daughter carries them in her car. Great service from the seller, with fast shipping in time for a birthday gift. Recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Great gates for FPV Drone racing practice!
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular product! Great company as well with good response time. I highly recommend getting the 6 pack directly from his website.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: High quality. My sons 7yo soccer team loved them. Very sturdy in the grass and easily to put back in the bag
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great little system that folds easy and works exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: KevinM9082

customer_reviews.title: Good goal for price. Concerned about arrived condition.
customer_reviews.text: Excited for the goals. They just arrived today. However one of the bags, one of the handles is already ripped and ready to fall off. Other than that they seemay like a good product. Plan to use it for our church function.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: They are a great size and perfect to use on the practice field
customer_reviews.text: They are a great size and perfect to use on the practice field. Just hard to fold back up, need some practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grandson just loved this gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandsons 9th BIRTHDAY gift. He just loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryll Kimbel

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: came exactly as described. only thing is i feel that they are going to snap when i am folding them up but that is how they show it.
customer_reviews.author: Fastlane 1300

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to play with my kids
customer_reviews.text: Great soccer goal. Perfect for playing ball with my kids in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher King

customer_reviews.title: Great for drone gates!
customer_reviews.text: Goals are perfect for Fpv gates. The sellers were very helpful. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Dotson

customer_reviews.title: GOAL!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the 7 yr olds that I coach. Sturdy, nice case. Simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: NCDCUBS

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids will love and they are easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in time for Christmas gifts. Grandkids will love and they are easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Keel

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Seriously?! Pulled goals out of the package and was immediately impressed by the price until I anchored the goals in the ground at practice. By the third shot, not one but two of the bungees that attach the anchores to the net fell apart. Ughhhh
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: Good practice goals, easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie9

customer_reviews.title: These are way better than the brand i bought last year
customer_reviews.text: These are way better than the brand i bought last year. These get abused buy the kids i coach and they seem to hold up great. Fild up great to for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Southworth

customer_reviews.title: ... pop goals for fpv quad racing and they are easy to set
customer_reviews.text: I use these pop goals for fpv quad racing and they are easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Denise and Duane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Goals are sturdy, easy to set up and the buying process was a pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Billingsley

customer_reviews.title: Can’t recommend..
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Both nets have completely disintegrated and the frame has cracked in multiple places.
customer_reviews.author: spenceraudio

customer_reviews.title: Product is as promised
customer_reviews.text: My sons will be so happy to receive this so they can practice while at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline M. Jomarron

customer_reviews.title: My son loves the goals! They are quick to ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the goals! They are quick to set up and take down. They come with a convenient carry bag and iare actually light enough to not mind carrying. To do it over, we would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Fast service.
customer_reviews.text: These popular up goals are excellent. Exactly what I was looking for. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Moore

product_meta.title: GreEco Set of 2 Pop Up Goals Foldable Gate - Pair of Soccer Goals or FPV Racing Gate Option
product_meta.description:
The GreEco Pop up goal is the easiest goal to get playing soccer quick - Enjoy soccer practice in any place & any time! 

Product Features:
It is the easiest goal to assemble with its pop-up mechanism. Instantly play a game, run a training session or work on your individual skills with a pair of GreEco pop up soccer goals.
It includes an innovative reflective silver perimeter surround for enhanced day and night visibility.
Attached stronger 8 inches pegs are included for the best stability on grass.
It is made from reinforced oxford fabric & net and high tensile solid fibre glass poles. When shopping around for a pop up goals, note that what many other brands goals are flimsy polyester fabric & cheap net and thin poles, indicative of inferior quality.
* The goals are convenient,take-anywhere pop-up design, enjoy soccer practice in any place & any time! 
Once you're done with your practice, with its twist setup, the goals can be folded/collapsed flat and store in the included carry bag, they are fold down to a 1-inch flat oval, making them compact and easy to carry and store!

Available in 3 sizes and safe for both kids and adults:
2.5 Feet | 2.5 x 1.7 x 1.7 feet (W x H x D) | Ages 2+
4 Feet | 4 x 2.7 x 2.7 feet (W x H x D) | Ages 4+ 
6 Feet | 6 x 3.5 x 3.5 feet (W x H x D) | Ages 6+

Guarantee:
Like all GreEco products, GreEco Pop Up Soccer Goal comes with a 100% manufacturers warranty.

Children under 3 years should be under direct supervision of an adult.
feature_bullets: Available in 3 sizes and safe for both kids and adults: 2.5 Feet - 2.5 x 1.7 x 1.7 feet (W x H x D): Ages 2+ 4 Feet - 4 x 2.7 x 2.7 feet (W x H x D) | Ages 4+ 6 Feet - 6 x 3.5 x 3.5 feet (W x H x D) | Ages 6+.

Pair of ultra-portable goals (pack of 2) for training and small-sided games. No assembly required, Pop-up design, just take out of carry bag and unfold to open. Once done, simply twist/fold and put back into 1 inch flat oval carry bag.The GreEco? Pop up goal is the easiest goal to get playing soccer quick - Enjoy soccer practice in any place & any time!

Durable & well made -- It is made from reinforced oxford fabric & net, high tensile solid fibre glass poles, stronger and longer PVC pegs. When shopping around for a pop up goals, note that what many other brands goals are flimsy polyester fabric & net,thin poles,weak pegs indicative of inferior quality.

Each goal displays an innovative reflective silver perimeter surround for enhanced day and night visibility.Attached anchoring stakes (8 inches PVC pegs,stronger and longer) are included for the best stability on grass.
Like all GreEco products, GreEco Pop Up Soccer Goal comes with a 100% manufacturers warranty.
